Package com.uno.server.model

Class OrderHandlerImpl

java.lang.Object
com.uno.server.model.OrderHandlerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderHandler
public class OrderHandlerImpl extends Object implements OrderHandler
A class that handles Order objects from the database to the client.
